inputs.name: messageLimit
inputs.label: Maximum comments to post
inputs.helpMarkDown: Posting too many comments makes the PR hard to read (highest severity messages will always be posted first).

messages.Error_InvalidMessageLimit: Expected message limit to be a number, but instead it was %s
messages.Error_InvalidPullRequestId: Could not retrieve pull request ID from the server.
messages.Error_FailedToGetAuthToken: Could not get an authentication token from the build agent.
messages.Info_NotPullRequest: Skipping pull request commenting - this build was not triggered by a pull request.
messages.Info_ResultFail_FailedToGetModifiedFiles: Failed to get the files modified by the pull request.
messages.Info_ResultFail_FailedToDeleteOldComment: Failed to delete previous PRCA comments.
messages.Info_ResultFail_FailedToPostNewComments: Failed to post new PRCA comments.
